document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">Forbidden </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">Fruit </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">flavor </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">has </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">That </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">lawful </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9848ff">Orchards </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">mocks </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">How </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">luscious </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">lies </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">within </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">Pod </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">Pea </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">Duty </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">locks </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Forbidden fruit a flavor has
